00020 class PresenceObject {
00021 private:
00022      int mCell;        
00023      Unit* mUnit;      
00024 
00026      double mFraction;
00027 
00028 public:
00036      PresenceObject(int c, Unit& u, double f) : mCell(c), mUnit(&u), mFraction(f) {}
00037      
00045      void set(int c, Unit& u, double f) { mCell = c; mUnit = &u; mFraction = f; }
00046 
00052      int cell() const { return mCell; }
00053 
00059      Unit& unit() const { return *mUnit; }
00060 
00066      double fraction() const { return mFraction; }
00067 
00068      void affect(std::vector<PresenceObject*>& potentialVictims) const;
00069 
00070 
00086      bool operator < (const PresenceObject& p) const {
00087           return ( mCell < p.mCell || (mCell == p.mCell && this < &p) );
00088      }
00089 };
00090 
00091 
00102 struct lessPresenceObjectPointer {
00111      bool operator()(const PresenceObject* const p1, const PresenceObject* const p2) const {
00112           if (!p1 || !p2) {
00113                return false;
00114           }
00115           else {
00116                return *p1 < *p2;
00117           }
00118      }
00119 };
